strategy: Craftworld Ulthwé armies have a Strategy Rating of 4.
Initiative: All formations have an Initiative Rating of 1+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Eldar Craftworld Ulthwé.

formations.name: 1 Wraithgate
formations.units: Replace one objective marker in the Eldar player's half of the table with a Wraithgate, this counts as an objective marker and a Webway Portal which may not be attacked or damaged in any way.

formations.name: Black Guardian Warhost
formations.units: Two Farseer units, six Eldar Guardians
upgrades: Transport, Seer Council, Heavy Weapons, Support Weapons, Wraithguards, Wraithlords, Windriders

sections.name: Ulthwé Troupes
sections.description: Up to two for each Ulthwé Warhost taken

formations.name: Aspect Warrior Troupe
formations.units: Six Aspect Warrior units chosen from the following: Dark Reapers, Dire Avengers, Fire Dragons, Howling Banshees, Striking Scorpions

formations.name: Engines of Vaul Troupe
formations.units: One Engine of Vaul chosen from the following: Cobra, Scorpion, Storm Serpent
upgrades: Add one or two additional Engine of Vauls for 200 points each chosen from the following: Cobra, Scorpion, Storm Serpent

formations.name: War Walker Troupe
upgrades: Add up to two War Walkers for 25 points each

sections.name: Ulthwé Aircraft, Spacecraft and Titans
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on these formations

upgrades.title: Ulthwé Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation

items.name: 0-1 Seer Council
items.description: Replace one Farseer character with an Seer Council

items.name: Exarch
items.description: Add one Eldar Exarch character to an Eldar Aspect Warrior unit

items.name: Firestorm
items.description: Replace one Falcon with a Firestorm

items.name: Heavy Weapons
items.description: Replace up to three Eldar Guardians with Eldar Heavy Weapon Platforms

items.name: Support Weapons
items.description: Add three Eldar Support Weapon Platforms

items.name: Transport
items.description: Add enough Wave Serpents and/or Falcons to transport all the units in the formation with no transport spaces left over if at all possible after any upgrades have been added to the formation.

items.name: Vypers
items.description: Replace any number of Eldar Jetbikes with Eldar Vypers

items.name: Windriders
items.description: Add up to four Windriders to the formation
